texture data: MOD PHYRIC, SMALLEST PCE (2.5CM X 1.5CM) HAS A GLASSY RIM ON ONE SIDE, THE LARGEST PCE (4.5CM X 7CM) HAS A GLASSY RIM ON TWO SIDES
alteration data: comments: ALL 3 PCES ARE COATED ON THE UNCUT SURFACES BY MATERIAL, IN THE SMALLEST PCE THE MATERIAL IS GREEN, IN THE MIDDLE SIZED PCE (2.5CM X 4.5CM) THE MATERIAL IS BROWN+BLUE+GRAY, IN THE LARGEST PCE THE MATERIAL IS GREEN+YELLOW GREEN+BROWN+BLUE, IN THE MIDDLE PCE THERE IS A THICK (5MM TO 20MM) ALTERED RIM, IN THE LARGEST PCE THERE IS A VERY THICK (TO 50MM) ALTERED RIM
other information data: REMAINDER OF CORE (0-6CM) IS FORAM NANNO OOZE
vesicle data: TO 1               CLAY comments : PINPOINT VESICLES IN ALL PCES FILLED WITH BLUE CLAY
